import {Modal, Button, Form, ListGroup} from 'react-bootstrap'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; const UpdateModal = ({data, show, onHide}) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(data); const updateFormData = (keyName, newValue) => { const newData = formData; newData[keyName] = newValue; setFormData(newData); } return { formData ?

Update Order

Reference Number
Customer Details
First Name { updateFormData('customer', ); }} type="text" defaultValue={formData.customer.firstName}/> Last Name Phone Number Email Address
Address
Name Type Address Line 1 Address Line 2
Orders
{ formData.orderList.map(order => { return Item Number Item Description }) }
: null } } export default UpdateModal;
